heading: HB07923
0: AN ACT PROVIDING INCENTIVES AND MECHANISMS TO CREATE NEW JOBS AND OPPORTUNITIES, IMPROVE PRODUCTION, AND ADVANCE INNOVATION AND TRADE IN THE COUNTRY, TO FOSTER AND DEVELOP THE PHILIPPINE STARTUP ECOSYSTEM
status: Pending with the Committee on LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT since 2018-07-30
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB07923
FULL TITLE : AN ACT PROVIDING INCENTIVES AND MECHANISMS TO CREATE NEW JOBS AND OPPORTUNITIES, IMPROVE PRODUCTION, AND ADVANCE INNOVATION AND TRADE IN THE COUNTRY, TO FOSTER AND DEVELOP THE PHILIPPINE STARTUP ECOSYSTEM
ABSTRACT : Defines the following terms as follows: Startup – any person, or registered entity in the Philippines which aims to develop an innovative product, process, or business model; Startup Enabler – any person, or registered entity registered under the Philippine Startup Development Program that provides goods, services, or capital identified to be crucial in supporting the operation and growth of startups by the DTI; Seeks to encourage the establishment and operation of an ecosystem of enterprise, government and non-government institutions that shall promote a pioneering entrepreneurial culture in the country; Creates the Philippine Startup Ecozones or the Special Economic Zones; Startup Commercialization and Impact Fund (SCIF); and the Startup Investment Matching Fund.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ROMERO, MICHAEL ODYLON L., Ph.D.
DATE FILED : 2018-07-16
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Chipeco (000 2018-11-14)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON LABOR AND EMPLOYMENT ON 2018-07-30
